function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying and hoarding of essential supplies","Impact":"Shortage of essential supplies, increased anxiety, and potential spread of the virus through crowded stores","Mitigation":"Implement limits on the quantity of essential supplies that can be purchased, provide clear and consistent communication to the public about the availability of essential supplies, and encourage online shopping and home delivery","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems to track and manage inventory, online shopping platforms, and home delivery services","People":"General public","Owner":"Retailers and government authorities"},{"Description":"Spread of the virus through large-scale events and religious gatherings","Impact":"Rapid increase in the number of cases, overwhelming of healthcare systems, and higher risk of community transmission","Mitigation":"Cancellation of large-scale events and religious gatherings, implementation of social distancing measures, and promotion of virtual events and gatherings","Technologies":"Virtual event platforms, contact tracing apps, and social distancing monitoring tools","People":"Event organizers, religious leaders, and attendees","Owner":"Government authorities and event organizers"},{"Description":"Community transmission in workplaces and public venues","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission among employees and customers, leading to a surge in cases","Mitigation":"Implementation of temperature screening, strict hygiene protocols, and limits on the number of people in public venues and workplaces","Technologies":"Contactless temperature screening devices, surveillance cameras for crowd monitoring, and workplace management systems for hygiene monitoring","People":"Employees, customers, and visitors","Owner":"Employers, venue operators, and government authorities"}]}
